definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Beauty are the best of the best, very very important for her.
sentences.chinese: 美是特需中的特需，對她來說非常非常地重要。

sentences.english: Beauty are the best of the best, very very important for her.

sentences.english: This approach to hazard identification does not require that someone with special training conduct it.
sentences.chinese: 這種危險辨識的方法不需要經過特需訓練的人來執行。

sentences.english: Willing to provide our clients with special needs services.
sentences.chinese: 願爲廣大客戶提供特需服務。

sentences.english: The marketing and distribution mechanism is the inner drive of Special demand medical treatment services.
sentences.chinese: 市場營銷機制是特需醫療服務的內在動力。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the implication of the individualized services in special wards.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解個體化服務在特需病房中的實施效果。

definition: to register (at a hospital etc)/to send by registered mail
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
